pullRequest.body:
---
The new instances generate some timeouts, and I don't understand why.

### PR summary [42a6a45079](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/7903/commits/42a6a45079e497f567842abfd1c49917668ca65c)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ NormedSpace.unboundedSpace`
`+ UnboundedSpace`
`+ boundedSpace_pi`
`+ boundedSpace_prod`
`+ cobounded_neBot_iff`
`+ compactSpace_iff_boundedSpace`
`+ diam_univ_of_unbounded`
`+ ediam_univ_eq_top`
`+ ediam_univ_eq_top_iff_unboundedSpace`
`+ instance (priority := 100) NontriviallyNormedField.unboundedSpace : UnboundedSpace ùïú`
`+ instance (priority := 100) RealNormedSpace.unboundedSpace [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E] : UnboundedSpace E`
`+ instance (priority := 100) [CompactSpace Œ±] : BoundedSpace Œ± := ‚ü®isCompact_univ.isBounded‚ü©`
`+ instance (priority := 100) [NeBot (cobounded Œ±)] : UnboundedSpace Œ±`
`+ instance (priority := 100) [UnboundedSpace Œ±] : NoncompactSpace Œ±`
`+ instance (priority := 50) [BoundedSpace Œ±] [ProperSpace Œ±] : CompactSpace Œ±`
`+ instance (priority := 50) [ProperSpace Œ±] [NoncompactSpace Œ±] : UnboundedSpace Œ±`
`+ instance (priority := 50) [h : UnboundedSpace Œ±] : Infinite Œ±`
`+ instance (priority := 80) RealNormedSpace.unboundedSpace [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E] :`
`+ instance : Bornology (Additive Œ±) := ‚ÄπBornology Œ±‚Ä∫`
`+ instance : Bornology (Multiplicative Œ±) := ‚ÄπBornology Œ±‚Ä∫`
`+ instance : Bornology Œ±·µí·µà := ‚ÄπBornology Œ±‚Ä∫`
`+ instance [BoundedSpace Œ±] : BoundedSpace (Additive Œ±) := ‚ÄπBoundedSpace Œ±‚Ä∫`
`+ instance [BoundedSpace Œ±] : BoundedSpace (Multiplicative Œ±) := ‚ÄπBoundedSpace Œ±‚Ä∫`
`+ instance [BoundedSpace Œ±] : BoundedSpace Œ±·µí·µà := ‚ÄπBoundedSpace Œ±‚Ä∫`
`+ instance [BoundedSpace Œ±] [BoundedSpace Œ≤] : BoundedSpace (Œ± √ó Œ≤)`
`+ instance [UnboundedSpace Œ±] : NeBot (cobounded Œ±) := cobounded_neBot_iff.2 ‚Äπ_‚Ä∫`
`+ instance [UnboundedSpace Œ±] : UnboundedSpace (Additive Œ±) := ‚ÄπUnboundedSpace Œ±‚Ä∫`
`+ instance [UnboundedSpace Œ±] : UnboundedSpace (Multiplicative Œ±) := ‚ÄπUnboundedSpace Œ±‚Ä∫`
`+ instance [UnboundedSpace Œ±] : UnboundedSpace Œ±·µí·µà := ‚ÄπUnboundedSpace Œ±‚Ä∫`
`+ instance [‚àÄ i, BoundedSpace (œÄ i)] : BoundedSpace (‚àÄ i, œÄ i) := boundedSpace_pi.2 <| .inr ‚Äπ_‚Ä∫`
`+ noncompactSpace_iff_unboundedSpace`
`+ not_boundedSpace_iff`
`+ not_unboundedSpace_iff`
`+ unboundedSpace_pi`
`+ unboundedSpace_prod`
`+ unbounded_univ`
`++ isBounded_univ`
`- NormedSpace.cobounded_neBot`
`- NormedSpace.unbounded_univ`
`- compactSpace_iff_isBounded_univ`
`- diam_univ_of_noncompact`
`- ediam_univ_of_noncompact`
`- instance (priority := 100) NontriviallyNormedField.cobounded_neBot : NeBot (cobounded ùïú)`
`- instance (priority := 100) RealNormedSpace.noncompactSpace [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E] : NoncompactSpace E`
`- instance (priority := 80) RealNormedSpace.cobounded_neBot [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E] :`
`- instance : Bornology (Additive Œ±)`
`- instance : Bornology (Multiplicative Œ±)`
`- instance : Bornology Œ±·µí·µà`
`- instance [BoundedSpace Œ±] : BoundedSpace (Additive Œ±)`
`- instance [BoundedSpace Œ±] : BoundedSpace (Multiplicative Œ±)`
`- instance [BoundedSpace Œ±] : BoundedSpace Œ±·µí·µà`
`- instance [BoundedSpace Œ±] [BoundedSpace Œ≤] : BoundedSpace (Œ± √ó Œ≤) := by`
`- instance [‚àÄ i, BoundedSpace (œÄ i)] : BoundedSpace (‚àÄ i, œÄ i) := by`
`- isBounded_of_compactSpace`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>
